[[English]]: Wooow! You've bothered me, like, {AnglerCompletedQuestsCount} times! If I didn't have a cool fish for each time, I would be really mad!
Did you know I have {AnglerCompletedQuestsCount} amazingly awesome fish now!? That's because as far as errand monkeys go, you're actually a bit useful!
I've got the cure for what ails ya! Get it? Ale? No?
They say you're strong, well, I know strong. Let's see if you measure up.
Back where I'm from, we only serve Root Beer...
This is a big upgrade from wiping that table all day.
Life's a challenge when you're just naturally better than everyone else.
A lot of tenacity and a little bit of luck can go a long way...
Have you seen any Meburs around here?
[[Japanese]]: この近くでメブルスを見かけたことはないか？

[[English]]: {Dryad} seems nice. I should bring her back with me.
Do you think {Steampunker} has an extra of that gun? I know a witch that may want one.
No wonder {Demolitionist} has so many accidents. You can't imagine how much ale he buys from me.
Normally, I'm not much of a fan of Goblins, but {GoblinTinkerer} seems to be an alright sort.
{?!Day}Really quiet out there. A little too quiet...
{?!Day}Check in with me, and do your job.
{?BloodMoon}You know, where I'm from, a Blood Moon is actually just an excuse to get some fresh air.
{?MoonLordDefeated}Moon Lord, don't you mean Abyss Lord?
{?HardMode}I know a Lavamancer that would really like that hellstone down in the underworld.
{?Homeless}Know any good places to set up shop? Would love to open up a bar here.
I'm not the type to scream and thrash around just because my ball lands in the water. I stay calm, and collected, and focus on the next shot.
Huh? You eat WHAT for breakfast?
An early bird catches the worm, but an early hole catches the birdie.
Lick your finger and hold it to the wind. Golf balls are lightweight and easily influenced by a breeze.
If sand is causing you nightmares, your wedge is your dreamcatcher.
Should I take up fishing? Bribing {Angler} to fetch my balls out of the water is emptying my wallet!
To strike high, strike far, or to get unstuck? It's all about the club you use. Choose wisely!
When I offer you to go clubbing, I don't mean downtown. I mean like, with a five iron?
In this game, only losers go for that high score.
Landscapers must make a lot of green off us golfers. Heh!
{Armsdealer} has mistaken my golf balls as ammo for his musket on several occassions.
According to {Dryad}, I'm murdering a lot of her friends when I mow the lawn. I gotta have a fairway for my course!
If you land on the green, use a putter! Don't let your balls go flying away when you're THAT close.
Don't go chasing water hazards, please stick to the fairways and greens that you're used to.
{?BloodMoon}The blood stains on my club? Have you seen the zombies outside?!
{?BloodMoon}I don't know what's scarier, a Blood Moon or my sister during a Blood Moon!
{?Rain}Golfing in THIS weather?! Only if you like swinging around a giant lightning rod!
I collected critters like you once, then I took a cursed fox bite to the knee!
{?Eclipse}Like wow, I feel like I belong with the creepy killer things running around right now. So glad I'm not that mindless.
I may not know, like, a whole lot...but I can talk your head off about nature and critters and animals and wildlife and...
My older bro calls me a lycanthrope. It means I'm like, part animal or something. He'd know, though, because he spends all his time outside!
I love animals, like, a lot! I tried to pet this weird looking fox one time, he sooo bit me, and now I became like one! Rad!
Staahp pulling on my tail, bro, it's totally real, and like...totally hurts when you pull on it!
Huh?! No, {Stylist} didn't dye my hair. It's naturally this color! It was like, dark brown before I was bitten, though!
Oh, THESE ears? Haha, totes better to hear you with, my dear!
This one time, at critter camp, I woke up one morning and everything was torn apart! Like, wow, how did I sleep through THAT?!
Wow, like, I've never seen a full moon. For some reason, it's like I pass out every time one's around!
I have noooo idea how I got here, but it's mega rad.
So, uh, I can't wear the hat. Sorry. I'm still here for the party, no worries!
My instincts are totally going wild. I really need to get out of here!
Ok, like, this place is totally freaky. It makes my fur stand on end!
Running in the wind makes me feel so free and wild. Totes try it sometime!
The breeze blows through my hair, it's, like, woah.
Eek!! You have NO idea how much thunder hurts my sensitive ears.
Is it over yet? I have this, like, irrational fear of thunderstorms.
Staaaap! Ugh! Not you, this lame rain.
For real!? I can't STAND being wet! It's gross.
The first thing you need to know about are the special defensive artifacts I've got for sale, but only if you've got some Defender Medals!
[[Japanese]]: 特別な防衛用のアーティファクの購入には、ディフェンダーメダルが必要だ、忘れるなよ！

[[English]]: You can use these artifacts to create traps and defensive towers. Doing so consumes Etherian mana, a special energy dropped only by members of the Old One's Army!
[[Japanese]]: アーティファクトを使用して、トラップや防御タワーを作成できる。 オールドワンズ・アーミーだけが落とすエーテリアンマナを使用すれば、 特別なエネルギーが得られるんだ！

[[English]]: Challenging the Old One's Army is rather simple. They are attracted to the power of the Eternia Crystals, and that can be used to bait them out.
[[Japanese]]: オールドワンズ・アーミーに挑戦するのは簡単だ。ヤツらはエターニアの水晶の力に引き寄せられてくる。

[[English]]: To place an Eternia Crystal, you must obtain an Eternia Crystal and a stand to put it in. It just so happens, you can buy em from me!
[[Japanese]]: エターニアの水晶を置くには、エターニアの水晶とエターニアの水晶台を手に入れる必要がある。ちょうどここにあるから、買っていったらどうだ！

[[English]]: You'll want to place your Eternia Crystal stand in a pretty open, flat area. Lots of walls and stuff might make it pretty difficult to protect!
[[Japanese]]: エターニアの水晶台を平らな開けた土地に置きたいと思うだろう。壁やごちゃごちゃと物が置いてあると戦いにくいからな！

[[English]]: Once your stand is set up, just interact with it while holding an Eternia Crystal, and prepare for a fight!
[[Japanese]]: 台を置いたら、エターニアの水晶を持って、そいつを使用するんだ、そして戦いに備えろ！

[[English]]: Of course, you can't let the Old One's Army destroy the Eternia Crystal! This will have catastrophic consequences for my home world of Etheria!
[[Japanese]]: もちろん、オールドワンズ・アーミーにエターニアの水晶を破壊させてはならん！ これは我がエターニアの世界にとって壊滅的な影響を与えることになるからな！

[[English]]: You can place defenses at the cost of 10 Etherian mana. Once placed, the Eternia Crystal will release some of this mana. Otherwise, you will need to defeat enemies to get more.
[[Japanese]]: 10個のエターニアの水晶を使って防御できる。Once placed, the Eternia Crystal will release some of this mana. Otherwise, you will need to defeat enemies to get more.

[[English]]: With the help of the defenses, you will have to repel several waves of invaders who are attempting to destroy both you and the Eternia Crystal!
[[Japanese]]: 防御の力を借りて、エターニアの水晶を破壊しにやってくる侵略者を撃退するんだ！

[[English]]: If you successfully repel the invasion, you'll be awarded with more Defender Medals, which you can bring to me to purchase more artifacts and some other special rewards!
[[Japanese]]: 侵略者を撃退すれば、多くの報酬を受け取れる。アーティファクトや特別な物を購入することができるんだ！

[[English]]: I've also heard rumors that the power of the artifacts themselves may be further unlocked if you defeat the Old One's Army. Perhaps you could even use them any time you wish!
[[Japanese]]: 噂では、オールドワンズ・アーミーを倒すと、 アーティファクト自体の力が更にアンロックされるらしい。 たぶん、いつでも使いたい時に使えるから安心しろ！

[[English]]: Normally I'd try to teach you all about the Old One's Army, but you should probably ask {Bartender} about that.
[[Japanese]]: いつもなら僕がオールドワンズ・アーミーについて教えるんけど、これについては{Bartender}に聞いてね。

[[English]]: When the moon goes red, the water becomes like blood. Creatures submerged within may become grotesque and malicious.
I hear a race of lizardmen live in the jungle. Maybe you can get the attention of one by felling a giant beast of the jungle?
I hear there's a woman out there well-versed in fighting back the forces you just unleashed. Maybe if you prove yourself, you can get her attention.
Machines aren't so bad. Maybe we can build one of our own, if we can just get some explosive weaponry from the jungle...
I once met a stylist in this region. She went off adventuring underground and that was the last I saw of her. Wonder what became of her?
Ever caught a strange fish and you aren't sure what to do with it? I hear a fishing master lives near the ocean who might have a use for those...
The Tortured Soul down in the Underworld sure looks familiar...have you tried using Purification Powder on him?
There have been some pirates sighted around lately. If we befriend one, you think he might show us where he buried his treasure?
There are some special plants and other ingredients that can be used to dye things. Maybe if you keep some with you, you'll find someone to show you how.
I've heard of glowing mushrooms growing big enough on the surface to gain sentience. Wonder if there's any truth to that...
They say sand is terrible for golfing. No self-respecting golfer would ever be caught in a desert...right?
Artists like to practice their craft, and painters like to paint. If enough people move in, we'll have enough homes that a painter might show up to spruce up the place!
A lot of people have moved in lately, haven't they? If it gets much more busy around here, a party girl will surely move in!
Always keep an eye out for strangers in need! You never know when you might meet someone new who is in need of help.
If {Merchant}'s wares don't interest you, a wandering merchant often visits with exotic merchandise you might prefer.
Not all of the undead monsters are hostile. I hear one even sells merchandise deep underground.
This world is full of many exciting and dangerous creatures to discover. There are some experts who might reward you for sharing that knowledge with them!
If you thought rainy days were a drag, wait till you see it raining slime!
On rare occasions, the moon will blot out the sun, bringing out lots of scary monsters!
Ever seen the Goblin Scouts in the outer regions of the world? I wonder if an invasion is imminent...
I think I saw a treasure map floating around in the ocean once, but a shark ate it. Maybe you should go try and find one?
I saw some flashing lights, high up in the sky and far away. The truth is out there, I'm telling you.
Have you ever seen beautiful lanterns floating across the night sky? The people of this world celebrate your victories, wishing you good fortune.
If you place an empty bottle on a table, you can use it to craft all sorts of neat potions!
Hang up any banners you earn from defeating foes, as they will help you in future combat with that creature.
It's pretty cold in the snow biome, but there are some unique treasures there as well. I'd check it out!
There are antlion tunnels deep beneath the desert, full of rare fossils and many hazards!
If you find a marble biome, be careful! They say that those locations are inhabited by some very dangerous creatures!
In granite biomes, the very stone itself is a threat, frequently coming to life and attacking intruders!
Need to craft something with ores you can't find on {WorldName}? Try fishing for crates, or placing silt and slush into the Extractinator!
If you ever need a break from all this adventuring, there's always time for some good old fashioned fishing.
While you explore the underground, you may occasionally encounter helpful fairies. If you follow them, maybe they will lead you to treasure!
Your next step should be to explore the caverns of the Crimson. Find and destroy any Crimson Hearts that you come across.
The Crimstone in the Crimson can be purified using some powder from a Dryad, or it can be destroyed with explosives.
Try to gather some obsidian, formed when water and lava meet. It can be used to protect against intense heat.
Some say there are giant bee hives buried underground in the jungle. I could do with some honey myself.
You found some old fossils in the desert? I wonder if there is a way to extract them from the rock.
It's time to upgrade that old Furnace! Look for a Hellforge in the Underworld, it's the only way to craft Hellstone bars.
Have you seen the Wyverns soaring high up in the clouds? If only I could fly like that...
Try combining a Hellforge with some adamantite ore. I bet you could make some really powerful stuff with that!
Try combining a Hellforge with some titanium ore. I bet you could make some really powerful stuff with that!
Run into any rare fruit growing in the jungle lately? If you eat it, it will increase your max life!
I've heard of glowing pink bulbs growing around the jungle recently. Be ready for anything if you decide to harvest one.
That key you have can be used to unlock the Temple hidden in the jungle. Have you found it yet?
They say that there is a sealed Temple, hidden away in the jungle. I wonder how you could open it?
Wow, that key you have is pretty nifty! I heard keys like that can be used to get rare treasure in the Dungeon!
I've heard reports of a very strange worm in the underground mushroom fields. I wonder if it would be any good as bait?
Ancient prophecies speak of a way to summon the monstrous hordes of Halloween through medallions crafted with pumpkins.
Legends tell of a cursed gift that can turn the most festive of nights into an invasion of horrors!
There are some strange people in hoods loitering outside of the Dungeon. Maybe you should check it out?
Where the heck did those Pillars come from?! You should clear out some of the monsters around them!
If you combine lenses at a crimson altar, you might be able to find a way to summon a powerful monster. You will want to wait until night before using it, though.
I don't have anything for you to do right now.
[[Japanese]]: 今はあんたにやれる仕事はないぜ。

[[English]]: You have entertained me enough for today, go.
[[Japanese]]: 今日は充分楽しませてもらったぜ。帰ってよし。

[[English]]: You are done, the grand {Angler} dismisses you!
[[Japanese]]: 仕事が終わった？なら、偉大なる{Angler}サマはあんたをクビにするだろうよ！

[[English]]: Only one fish a day, please go away!
[[Japanese]]: 魚は1日1匹までだ、さぁ帰った！

[[English]]: I haven't even used the last fish you gave me.  I don't need another.
[[Japanese]]: まだ前にもらった魚を堪能してないんだ。他の魚はまだいらないぜ。

[[English]]: Oh! Thanks for the fish I asked for, now scram!
[[Japanese]]: おぉ！頼んでた魚じゃないか、さ、帰った帰った！

[[English]]: Awesome catch! It's all going according to plan! He he he!
[[Japanese]]: 大漁だぜ！これで全て計画通りかも！ヘッヘッヘ！

[[English]]: You make a great errand monkey! Now go away!
[[Japanese]]: あんたは優秀な使いっ走りになれるな！さぁ行った！

[[English]]: Muahahahahaha! You did it! You're still in one piece though, how boring!
[[Japanese]]: ぶはははは！よくやった！でも、まだ終わりじゃないんだぜ、あーうんざりだ！

[[English]]: Woah!? You actually did what I asked, and survived! Nice, hand it over and beat it!
[[Japanese]]: なんと！？よくぞ私の期待に応え、生き延びた！流石だ、それをよこしてさっさと失せるんだ！

[[English]]:
Na na na na na na na Bat-FISH! That means go digging underground, fetch it, and bring it to me!

(Caught in Underground & Caverns)
[[Japanese]]: ナナナナナナナナ…バットフィーッシュを！地下を掘って、誘い出し、釣り上げて、持ってこい！\n\n(地下か洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
The subterranean jungles of {WorldName} have the weirdest things! Like, there's this fish I saw that looked just like a giant bumblebee! I'm allergic to bees, so you have to catch it for me! I bet it'd taste like a tuna and honey sandwich!

(Caught in Honey)
[[Japanese]]: {WorldName}のジャングルの地下で、マルハナバチくらいデカい魚を見たんだよ！俺はハチアレルギーだからあんたが捕まえてきてくれ！きっとマグロとハチミツを挟んだサンドイッチみたいな味なんだぜ！\n\n(蜂蜜の池で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I finally found a jungle cat that likes water! I think it's because it's also part fish. I don't know why this happened, and I don't want to know. I just want it in my hands, and make it snappy!

(Caught in Jungle Surface)
[[Japanese]]: ジャングルでようやく泳ぐネコを見つけたんだ！多分、体の一部が魚なんだと思う。何でそうなったのか知りたくもないし、まぁ分かんねえけどよ。とにかくその、泳ぐネコが欲しいんだ！\n\n(地上ジャングルで釣れる)

[[English]]:
There's a rumor going around that there are islands that float high up in the sky, and that they have amazing treasure! Who cares about that though, what's even cooler is that sometimes lakes form in the clouds, and in those lakes are fish made out of clouds! I wanna know what it tastes like, so you better go catch it for me!

(Caught in Sky Lakes)
[[Japanese]]:
なんでも、上空のどこかに、浮島があるっていう噂らしい。しかも、すごいお宝が埋もれてるって話だ！
まあ、そんな事はどうでもよくて、俺は湖の形をした雲から時々、魚が出てくるってのが気になる！
どんな味がするのか食ってみたくてよ...つまりだ、俺のためにひとつ捕まえて来てくれ！

(空島で釣れる)

[[English]]:
There's a cursed fish swimming in the waters of the deepest corruption! It was forged of the cursed flames that spread from the fallen horrors that lurk down there. They say not even water can put out this fire, and that it can burn forever. I can think of some awesome things I can do with a fish like that! You gonna go get it for me, or are you too chicken!?

(Caught in Corruption)
[[Japanese]]:
不浄の地の奥底には、それは恐ろしい魚が泳いでるんだぜ！
そいつは深い闇に潜み、忘れた頃に呪われた炎から生まれるんだ。
なんでも、その火は水ですら消えず、永遠に燃え続けるって噂だ。
俺はそいつを使って...そう、あんな事やこんなことだってできる！
もちろん取って来てくれるよな？それとも怖くて行けねえってか！？

(不浄の地で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I was reeling in the big one when this funny talking zombie burst out of the forest lake and started rambling on about this 'ferocious' species of fish made out of dirt! He says it could suffocate ten blokes his size, or something like that... I want it! NOW!

(Caught in Surface & Underground)

The demolitionist was raising cane about losing a stick of dynamite in the lake out in the forest. He has like, so many, so why does one matter? Apparently, because it grew fins and started swimming away! I don't know where he gets his materials to make those things, but that one is clearly possessed! Reel it in and bring it to me, I always wanted a suicide bombing fish! Don't ask why...

(Caught in Surface)
[[Japanese]]:
爆破技師が森の湖でダイナマイトを１本無くしたって騒いでたぜ。他にもいっぱい持ってるのになんでそんなに騒ぐのかって？
どうやらそのダイナマイトは魚になって泳ぎだしたらしいんだ！どんな材料を使ったらそんなことになるのかは分からねぇけどさ、きっと何かにとり憑かれたんだ！
そいつを釣ってきてくれ、自爆魚が欲しいってずっと思ってたんだ！なんで欲しいかって？それは秘密だよ…
(地表で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I bet you're not brave enough to find the Eater of Plankton. A corrupt fish that was mutated from a severed piece of the Eater of Worlds itself! Capture it and bring it to me, and prove to me you're not a wuss!

(Caught in Corruption)
[[Japanese]]: あんたにはプランクトンイーターを見つけられる勇気はないだろうな。このケガれた魚は、斬られたイーターオブワールドの一部から生まれたらしいぜ！弱虫の汚名を返上したいなら、この魚を釣ってみろ！\n(不浄の地で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I love collecting those bright yellow stars that fall from the sky! I love it even more when they land on someone's head. But.. but.. nothing beats a star that falls in a foresty lake and turns into a fish! That's just totally rad, and you're just rad enough to get it for me!

(Caught in Sky Lakes)
[[Japanese]]:
俺は空から降ってくる黄色いキラキラ星を集めるのが好きなんだ！星が誰かの頭にぶつかるのも大好きだけどな。
でも、でもな、なによりも一番ステキなのは星が森の湖に落ちてきて魚になることさ！
すごくイカしてる魚だが、それをあんたが釣ってきたらもっとイカしてると思うぜ！
(空島で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Apparently, Demon Eyes can sometimes be amphibious. They don't fly, they swim! I want to see the look on someone's face when they find it in their bathtub! They hang around the same areas. That means you reel one in for me!

(Caught in Sky Lakes & Surface)
[[Japanese]]:
どうやらデーモンアイは時々水中で過ごしてるらしいぜ。あいつらは飛んでるんじゃない、泳いでるってことだよ！
風呂場で泳いでるのを誰かが目撃したとしたらどんな顔するか見ものだな！
あいつらはその辺の水辺をうろうろしてるらしいぜ。俺のために釣ってきてくれよ！

(空島か地上で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I don't know what's worse, a bone fish or a bone fish with HANDS. This Fish-o-Tron deep in the caverns really freaks me out! I think it's possessed by the same evil spirits that possessed that old man by the dungeon! I double duck dare you to go catch it!

(Caught in Caverns)
[[Japanese]]:
詳しいことはさっぱりなんだが、骨の魚ってのが釣れるらしいんだ。そのフィッシュオトロンって奴は俺でもブルっちまうような地下深くに住んでるそうだぜ。
きっとダンジョンのじいさんのと同じ悪霊が取りついてるんだろうな！
頑張って釣ってきてくれよな！

(洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I was trying to sleep by the hill lakeside when this fish swooped down at me. It was flying! It also had the face of a lady and had feathers! I think I screamed louder than she did! Hey you, go make her pay for scaring me like that!

(Caught in Sky Lakes & Surface)
[[Japanese]]:
丘の湖畔で昼寝をしようとしてたら突然魚が降ってきたんだ。そいつは空を飛ぶのさ！
女の顔をしてて羽も生えてるんだ！魚が叫んだもんで俺はもっと大声で叫んじまったよ！
なぁ、あんた。俺をビビらせた仕返しをしてやってくれよ！

(空島か地上で釣れる)

[[English]]:
There's a piece of the Hunger that morphed from the Wall of Flesh into a small fish-like thing that swims around aimlessly in the underworld and it's gross and it's yucky and I want it now!

(Caught in Caverns)
[[Japanese]]: 欲しくてたまらないものがあるんだ。そいつはウォールオブフレッシュが小さな魚のように変化した物体で、地下をあても無く泳ぎ続けてるらしい。気味が悪くておまけにゲロまずいらしいけど今すぐそいつを俺にくれ！\n\n(洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Did you know deep in the crimson, some of those creatures make this gross yellow stuff? I overheard a crazy story about a pool of it having melted together into a shape of a fish and it swims around and everything! Fetch it for me, so I can stick it in someone's toilet!

(Caught in Crimson)
[[Japanese]]:
真紅の土地の地下に黄色いカスを吐き出す化け物がいるのを知ってるか？
俺はとんでもない話を聞いたんだ。なんでもその化け物が集まり溶け合って魚になって泳ぎ回るんだと！
釣ってきてくれよ！誰かのトイレにその魚をつっこんでみたいんだよ！

(真紅で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Oooooohhh, I'm going to be SO rich! Deep in the caverns, there is a fish made out of gemstones! Don't ask me how, I don't know, all I know is that this fish is totally awesome and you're going to catch it for me!

(Caught in Underground & Caverns)
[[Japanese]]:
あぁああああああ、大金持ちになりてぇ！なんでも洞窟の奥深くに、宝石でできた魚がいるそうじゃねぇか！
釣り方なんて俺に聞くなよ、とにかくどえらい魚なんだから釣って持って来い！

(地下か洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
There's some interesting critters to be found in the deeper Hallows, I tell you! They glow this crazy purple color and it messes with my eyes! It's totally wild, so I want you to catch a fish like that for me!

(Caught in Underground Hallow)
[[Japanese]]:
神聖な土地の地下深くに面白い魚が住んでるのを知ってるか！
いかれた紫色に光ってて、見てると目が回ってくる奴だよ！
そいつはとても乱暴なやつなんだ、あんたが釣ってきてくれ！

(地下聖域で釣れる)

[[English]]:
What's white and tan and fluffy and lives in a frozen underground lake? A mutant flinxfin! I wasn't telling a joke, you know, there really is a mutated variety of Flinx that is more adapted to an aquatic lifestyle! I want it to adapt to my fishbowl, so make sure that happens!

(Caught in Underground Tundra)
[[Japanese]]:
白と茶色のふわふわした生き物が地下の凍った湖に住んでるって？そいつは突然変異したスノーフリンクスだ！
これは冗談じゃないぜ、水中や他のいろんな環境に適応したフリンクスが本当にいるんだよ！
俺の金魚鉢に適応したフリンクスも見てみたいもんだ、あんたが実現してくれよ！

(地下雪原で釣れる)

[[English]]:
It's a whale! It's a dolphin! No, it's a penguin fish! Oh, and look, it's you! You get to bring me one! You do know they only like cold water, right?

(Caught in Tundra)
[[Japanese]]:
サメだ！イルカだ！いや、ペンギンウオだ！あぁ、なんだあんたか！
ペンギンウオを捕まえてきてくれよ！冷たい水の中にいるのは知ってるよな？

(雪原で釣れる)

[[English]]:
There's a really really rare type of pixie that's born with so many wings that it can't actually fly! It swims with the fishes in the lakes surrounded by that blue colored grass. My fish tank needs a lamp, so I want you to catch me that pixie!

(Caught in Hallow)
[[Japanese]]:
実際には飛べないがたくさんの翼を持って生まれた超レアなピクシーがいるんだってよ！
そいつは青い草に囲まれた湖で魚といっしょに泳ぐんだと。
俺の水槽に明かりが欲しいんで、そのピクシーを釣ってきてくれよ！

(聖域で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I saw a fish that had eight legs! Nope! Not happening! You're fishing it for me, so it's not alive when I hold it! That's the last time I go fishing so deep in the cavern!

(Caught in Underground & Caverns)
[[Japanese]]:
俺は８本足の魚を見た！まじかよ！そんなばかな！
あんたが釣ってきてくれ、死んでる状態で頼むぜ！
洞窟の奥深くで釣りをするのはもうこりごりだ！

(地下か洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Unicorns and rainbows are absolutely great! They're everywhere, even in the water. No, really, I actually saw a unicorn fish in the Hallowed lake! Your job is to reel it up and let me have it as a pet!

(Caught in Hallow)
[[Japanese]]: ユニコーンと虹の組み合わせはいつ見ても良いもんだ！水中でだってそうだ！いや、本当だぜ？聖域の湖でユニコーンフィッシュを見たんだからな！ペットにしたいから釣ってきてくれよ！\n\n(聖域で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Those demons in the underworld really like voodoo dolls, but I think there's a doll out there who was blasted with way too much magic! It turned into a fish and it does stuff on its own. I dare you to go down and get me one! I'd watch out for the boiling lava, because it burns you to death and that won't get me my fish!

(Caught in Caverns)
[[Japanese]]:
地獄に住んでるデーモンって本当にブードゥー人形が好きだよな。でもあいつらいくつの人形を魔法でぶっ飛ばしちまってるんだろうな！
吹っ飛んだ人形は魚になって、その魚が人形の材料になるらしいぜ。なんとかしてその魚を釣ってきてくれ！
ぐつぐつの溶岩に気をつけろよ、あんたが焼け死んだら魚が手に入らないんだからな！

(洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I know something youuuuu don't! Fine, I'll tell you, there's a terrifying creature that flies among the stars! I'm not making this up! It's called a Wyvern! But, but, you knew that already, right? Well what you don't know is that they are born and raised as tadpoles! So, they're actually like.. well, a frog! Hop to it and get me one!

(Caught in Sky Lakes)
[[Japanese]]:
あんたが知らない事を俺は知ってるぞぉお！よし、教えてやろうか。空の星の中を飛び回る、恐ろしい化け物がいるんだ。嘘じゃないぜ！
その名はワイバーン！まて、まてよ、ここまではおまえも知ってるよな？ここからが新事実だ。ワイバーンはおたまじゃくしみたいなものとして生まれて、そこからあれに成長するんだ！
つまり、ワイバーンは…まぁ、カエルなんだな！さっさとオタマジャクシの頃のを釣ってきてくれ！

(空島で釣れる)

[[English]]:
You won't believe it! I caught a fish in the forest at night that was already dead! Then it tried to eat me! I threw it away and ran! Now I want to stick it in someone's dresser to see what happens, so go fish it back up for me will ya?!

(Caught in Surface)
[[Japanese]]:
なんてこった！夜の森で死んでる魚を釣ったんだぜ！しかもそいつは俺に喰いつこうとしやがった！だから思わず投げ捨てて逃げちまった！
でも、そいつを誰かのドレッサーに投げ込んでみたらどうなるか試したくなってきたんだよな。俺の代わりに釣ってきてくれるよな！？

(地上で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I found this spectacular place draped in giant glowing mushrooms! Everything was blue! I was picking some of the mushrooms I found next to a glistening blue lake, when one of the mushrooms snapped at me and swam away! I want to give it a taste of its own medicine, and give it a good chompin'! What I mean is, you gotta get it for me!

(Caught in Glowing Mushroom Fields)

Did you know there's magical islands that float up high in the sky? Bet you didn't! They say angels live in the sky, and I believe those angels have fins and gills and swim around! I believe you must catch one for me!

(Caught in Sky Lakes)
[[Japanese]]: 空高くに浮かぶ魔法の島のことを知ってるか？知らねぇだろうなぁ！そこには天使が住んでるらしいぜ。きっとヒレとエラがついてて泳ぎ回ってるんだろうな！きっとあんたが釣ってきてくれるんだろうな！\n\n(空島で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Ow! Don't get near me! I got stung by a Bloody Man-O-War! In case you're not smart enough to know what that is, it's the most menacing jellyfish in all of {WorldName}! Go to that rotten crimson and catch it if you dare! 

(Caught in Crimson)
[[Japanese]]: いてて！さわるなよ！シビレクラゲに刺されちまったんだ！頭の悪いあんたに教えてやるが、そいつは{WorldName}の中で一番恐ろしいクラゲだ！腐った真紅の土地でそいつを釣ってこいよ！出来るもんならな！\n\n(真紅で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Normally I could care less if I see fishbones floating in the water underground, but this one was swimming! What, you thought that only human skeletons still flailed about in {WorldName}? Get it for me so I can stick it in someone's bed!

(Caught in Underground & Caverns)
[[Japanese]]: 普通、地下の水場で魚の骨が浮いててもいちいち気にしねぇが、そいつが泳いでやがったら話は別だ！{WorldName}で動き回ってる骨は人型だけじゃないんだぜ？誰かのベッドにそいつを突っ込んでやりたいから、釣ってきてくれよ！\n\n(地下か洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Out in the forest, I was fishing right? Well guess what! A bunny hopped up to me! Then another one hopped up, and another... suddenly I'm surrounded by bunnies! One even swam up to me from the water, but it had no legs! I fell outta my chair in surprise and all the bunnies scurried off! I want that bunny fish as a pet, so you better catch it for me! Pronto!

(Caught in Surface)
[[Japanese]]: 森のはずれで釣りをしていた時だったな…何が起こったと思う？１匹のウサギが俺に跳び乗ったんだ！さらに２匹、３匹…ついには周りをウサギに囲まれた！そして水中からもウサギが跳び出したんだが、そいつには足がなかったんだ！思わず椅子から転げ落ちたらウサギの群れは逃げちまった！あのウサギ魚をペットにしたいから釣ってきてくれ！さっさと頼むぜ！\n\n(地上で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Yarr matey! Shiver me timbers! Avast, scallywags! There's a pirate captain who once had a pet fish named Cap'n Tunabeard, but during a big storm the fishbowl fell overboard! It has a hook for a tail, and an eyepatch and everything! You need to fetch me that fish, so I can be as cool as a pirate! Obviously it's out in the ocean somewhere! Duh!

(Caught in Ocean)
[[Japanese]]: ヨーホー相棒！船も震えろ！悪党も逃げろ！ある海賊の船長が「ツナひげ船長」って名の魚を飼ってたんだが、ある嵐の日、そいつが入った金魚鉢が海に落ちちまったんだ！そいつの尾びれはかぎヅメで、眼帯やらなにやらを付けている！あんたが釣ってきてくれたら、俺もクールな海賊だ！もちろんそいつは海にいるぜ！あったりまえだろ！\n\n(海で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I saw this bright orange and colorful fish by the ocean, and it was looking around frantically as though it was seeking a lost family member! Go catch it for me, so that another one will show up looking frantically for him instead!

(Caught in Ocean)
[[Japanese]]: 海でオレンジ色のきれいな魚を見たんだ。そいつははぐれた家族を探してるみたいに、必死になってきょろきょろしてたんだ！あんたが釣ってきてくれたら、きっとまた別のやつが必死になってきょろきょろするんだろうな！\n\n(海で釣れる)

[[English]]:
I hear in the underworld, that the King of all demons is actually a fish! Just imagine the absolute power I would have if you caught it for me!

(Caught in Caverns)
[[Japanese]]: ウワサによると、地獄に住まう悪魔の王は魚なんだってよ！考えても見ろよ！あんたがそいつを釣ってきてくれたら俺は絶対王者になれるんだぜ！\n\n(洞窟で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Those Derplings in the jungle are the most scary creatures I've ever seen! Good thing is, sometimes they don't have legs! These ones live in the water and are a lot less scary! Catch me one now so I can see what they taste like without being scared half to death!

(Caught in Jungle Surface)
[[Japanese]]: ジャングルに住むダープリングは、今まで見た中で一番恐ろしい生き物だ！ありがたいことに、奴らには足が無い！奴らが水中で暮らしてるお陰でいつもビクビクせずに済むってことだよ！俺は死ぬような思いはなるべくしたくないんだ、あんたが釣ってきてくれ！\n\n(地上ジャングルで釣れる)

[[English]]:
There's a legend of a mighty being known as the Fishron! It's part pig, part dragon, and part FISH! I hear it hangs around in the frozen subterranean lakes of the coldest part of the world! I'm not going there, so YOU go catch it and makes sure it lands in my hands! I'm so excited!

(Caught in Underground Tundra)
[[Japanese]]: 伝説に語られる強大な存在、その名もフィッシュロン！ブタと、コウモリと、ドラゴンを組み合わせたような魚だ！氷の世界の地下深くで捕まえられるらしいぜ。あんたがそいつを釣って俺の手元に持ってくる！ワクワクするよな！\n\n(地下雪原で釣れる)

[[English]]:
A really long fish that looks like a sword's sheath swims in the murky waters of the corruption! It looks a lot like ebonstone, so don't let it fool you! That's right, you. You're catching it, not me!

(Caught in Corruption)
[[Japanese]]: 剣のサヤみたいなめちゃくちゃ長い魚が不浄の濁った水の中にいるんだ！その魚はエボンストーンによく似ているから、ダマされるなよ！そう、その魚をあんたが釣ってくるんだよ、俺じゃなくてな！\n\n(不浄の地で釣れる)

[[English]]:
Watch your step when wading through jungle waters! Why? No, not because I care about you being eaten by piranhas. I care because you'll step on one of my favorite kinds of fish, the Mud Fish! I also care a lot that you're going to grab me one as a pet!

(Caught in Jungle)
[[Japanese]]: ピラニアとかサメはブサイク！チョーブッサイク！でもキレイな顔してあんたの顔を食べちまう魚は知ってるか？衝撃の場面を見られるなら２プラチナ払ってやっても良いが、でもな、一番重要なのは、あんたがそれを釣ってくるってことだ。あんたの顔が無くなる前に俺のところに持ってきてくれよ！\n\n(地上ジャングルで釣れる)

[[English]]:
Piranhas and sharks are ugly! Soooo ugly! Did you know there's a fish that looks very pretty and still can eat your face off? I would pay 2 platinum to see that happen, by the way... To the point, though, you catchy for me. Just make sure I have it before you lose your face!

(Caught Jungle Surface)
[[Japanese]]: ジャングルの水中を進むときは足元に気をつけろよ！何故かって？いや、ピラニアに喰われるからじゃないぜ。俺のお気に入りの魚、泥魚を踏みつけるなってことだよ！そいつをペットにしたいから釣ってきてほしい、これも重要だから気をつけておいてくれよ！\n\n(ジャングルで釣れる)

[[English]]:
You ever wonder why the lakes on the surface of the snowy areas of {WorldName} never ice over? I don't. The fish, however, do! A fish made out of ice would make a great offering to the mighty and amazing {Angler}! Go, my loyal subject, and bring me this Tundra Trout with haste!

(Caught in Surface Tundra)
[[Japanese]]: {WorldName}の雪原の水が何故凍らないか気になるか？俺はどっちでもいいけど。んじゃあ魚はどうだろうか！氷でできた魚はこの{Angler}にとって素晴らしい贈り物になるかもな！俺の偉大な計画のために、ツンドラマスを早く釣ってきてくれ！\n\n(地上雪原で釣れる)

[[English]]:
In the forest, the slimes are kinda gross. Slimefish are even more so! I don't want to swim with slimes, so yoink one out of the water for me!

(Caught in Surface Forest)

I read this ancient story about a fish that looks like a magical scarab! That's beetle, for simpletons like you! Where do you find it? Where do you think? In the desert, duh! Don't look at me like that... it's true! There is actually water out there! I'd go, but I don't like having my eyeballs pecked out by vultures. So... you do it!

(Caught in Desert)

I'm sure someone, a really stupid someone, tried to tell you there was no water in the desert! They were absolutely and positively wrong! There's this thing called an Oasis, and it has water in it! Guess what happens when you have water!? That's right, you have fish! Weird fish that try to sting you and pinch you and do all kinds of other mean things to you! A perfect pet for me, and a perfect job for you!

(Caught in Desert)
About time we gotta barkeep around here! Me rum was almost gone!
I thought you said you purified {TaxCollector}? He's just as greedy as ever!
I wonder why my predecessor spontaneously burst into flames. Hopefully it doesn't happen to me...
I keep asking for wine, but all {Bartender} gives me are mugs of ale.
I offered {Bartender} a free trim, but he refused. I mean, I could have at least worked on his mustache!
{Bartender} said I reminded him of a certain "EV2". Perhaps I should meet her.
{Bartender} offered me a Root Beer, I told him to give it to me in a square cup.
How come {Bartender} won't sell me any ale? I want to try some! What a grouch!
[[Japanese]]: どうにかして{Bartender}に酒を売ってもらえないか？試してみたいんだ！なんとなくな！

[[English]]: Whaaaat?! Can't you see I'm winding up fishing line??
I have enough fish! I don't need your help right now!
There's no chefs in all of {WorldName}, so I have to cook all this fish myself!
Hey! Watch it! I'm setting up traps for my biggest prank ever! No one will see it coming! Don't you dare tell anyone!
Let a kid give you some advice, never touch your tongue to an ice block! Wait, forget what I said, I totally want to see you do it!
Ever heard of a barking fish?! I haven't, I'm just wondering if you did!
{WorldName} is filled to the brim with the most outlandish kinds of fish!
I'm bummed out! There's probably been fish that have gone extinct before I even was born, and that's not fair!
I don't have a mommy or a daddy, but I have a lot of fish! It's close enough!
You know, these Etherian Goblins are nothing like my people. Really rowdy bunch. Not that my people are much better...
You know what would be the best way to party? Buying things for others, specifically from me.
This eerie atmosphere is bad for business!
This is a terrible location... I can't sell my wares to the dead!
What a blustery day! Stay awhile, and buy a thing or two.
I used slime glue to keep my hat from blowing away! Perhaps I can sell you some for a couple gold coins...
Wanna buy a lightning rod? Oh, seems I'm out of stock.
Storms rollin' in... how 'bout you come in and buy something?
Umbrellas! Umbrellas! Get your half-off umbrellas!
How dreary! Lighten the mood with 99 torches!
No, I will not tell you how many candles are on my cake.
Ahh!! I'd rather be working at an abandoned hospital than hanging around here!
This place creeps me out, and I can't treat dead patients!
This breeze is really extra right now! Beware of flying needles.
I been chasing my medical instruments all day. This gale is keeping me fit!
I do not perform shock therapy, just go stand outside under a tree!
Just stay inside! I've already treated too many electrocuted patients today.
If you stay out there too long, you'll catch a cold!
Great! Now my uniform is all wet. Stop staring!
Parties are great for getting people to come out of their shell, just like with bullets.
I hate places like this. I can't kill what's already dead!
If you see any suspicious activity out in that fog, I wasn't involved.
Was tryin' out my new gun, but the wind kept me off target!
Don't spray and pray in the wind, buddy!
A lightning gun? Don't have time for that, man. I love my bullets!
If you time it right, no one will hear your gunshots with the thunder.
Heard a rumor that some clouds are literally out to get you! Show 'em whose boss with one of my guns!
Flying fish? I call that target practice!
When I was in Etheria, I felt so disconnected from {WorldName}. Its good to be back.
The Corruption tried to take me over when I went to Etheria, but instead, I used its power against the Old One's Army!
{0} is completely pure. You have done an amazing job!
[[Japanese]]: {0}は完全に浄化されているわね。見事な仕事ぶりよ！
この土地の環境は調和が取れているわ。

[[English]]: We are living in a fairy tale.
[[Japanese]]: おとぎ話の世界に住んでいるみたいだわ。
ちょっと厳しい状況ね…

[[English]]: You have a lot of work to do.
I thought I would throw a party to celebrate our victories in the past and those yet to come.
I can handle the corruption, but the vile air of death in this location wilts the flower in my hair.
This place... I can hear the cry of nature at those who've fallen here.
The wind... it is nature's way of sweeping the dust from the land.
Nature's fury strips the leaves from the trees this day.
Our mother is angry, and wishes to burn away the filth by raining destructive power on our treetops.
It is unwise to traverse openly beneath the flashing dangers from above.
The water from the sky is a way for nature to wash away the mud in our streams.
When it rains, many kind of fish acquire some mystical properties.
Never been to a party before? You might want to check around with the others. People sometimes bring out special party favors.
[[Japanese]]: パーティーに参加したことはあるかい？ 周りの人を調べてみたらいいよ。 なんか特別な物を持ってるかもね。

[[English]]: Graveyards are spooky and very dangerous. I'd watch your step, kid.
It's cold and ominous around here. I feel something very evil calling out to me.
Be advised that certain creatures only come out during rain.
Don't be alarmed, it is just water. I hear certain species of fish can fly when it rains!
Don't get blown away by the strong gusts going on, and be wary of monsters which take advantage of them!
It's windy out there! Now is the best time to fly a kite.
It's dangerous to be out in a thunderstorm. Take cover, kid.
Lightning is no joke, very powerful fiends come out in this weather.
If you defeat enough of these slimes, you might invoke the wrath of their king. Be careful!
Huh?! Where is the sun? Why is it so dark? It must be a Solar Eclipse!
What a beautiful night! With your recent victory, the world seems more at peace, and these lanterns are in celebration of that.
Do you see the lanterns? Now that you've saved our world, there are regular celebrations of your victory. Always such a beautiful sight!
I don't see why we can't just blow up those portals.
You might want to be careful today. Us dwarves tend to have pretty explosive parties.
The stench of death here is worse than the skeleton-infested caverns where I work!
All these piles of bones and stones... perfect for blowin' up!
Now might not be the best time to lob grenades on the surface, my tall friend!
You want boomerang bombs? Throw some out in that gust, they'll come back to you alright!
BOOM! Even mother nature likes a taste of gratifying demolition!
You shoulda seen it when lightning struck one of my carts filled with explosives!
This is a terrible day to be a dwarf.
ARGH! Another fuse put out by all this wet stuff! This never happens underground!
Mama always said you've got to put the past behind you before you can party on.
I've been cursed! Take me to the hospital!
It's a big graveyard, we'll divide it up! The dead stay in their half, we'll stay in ours!
Sometimes, I guess there's just not enough windmills.
The air has certainly got it, today!
Remember to keep breathing, because eventually this storm will pass!
If it wasn't storming, everyone would go outside. It's the lightning that makes it dangerous.
It's raining alright! Little bitty stingin' big ol' fat sideways rain! At least it ain't coming from straight up underneath us!
One day it started raining like this, and it didn't quit for four days!
Goblin parties are a lot like humans. They both have games like "Pin the Blame on the Human" er... I don't play that game at my parties.
I'm working on a Photon Sack. It's an invention to trap all the ghasts lurking around outside!
The constant moaning and ear-piercing screeching noises are distracting me from my work!
This weather is the reason why I wear goggles! I can't have dirt and sand blowing in my eyes.
Now would be a great time to tinker a pinwheel accessory!
I'm working on an invention that will harness the energy being released around us!
Most goblins hate thunderstorms. Probably because they carry so many spiky balls.
All this rainfall makes it hard to see. I should tinker my goggles with a pair of windshield wipers.
Humans are a lot taller than goblins. When it floods, we are always in big trouble!
You know, I think I've seen a portal like that before, but it was gold.
Clearly I throw the most magical of parties.
I can't bring anyone back from the dead, so don't ask!
Funny, when I look far enough into the crystal ball, this is where every customer ends up!
This gale got you bothered? There's a spell for that.
A blast of wind terrorizing our world? Did I do that?
Did somebody steal my spell book again!?
You call this lightning!? Back in my day, I .. uh.. Hmm. Oh, did you need something?
Yes, I can go out in the rain and not melt. I'm a wizard, dammit!
Raindrops falling on my... uh.. Where am I? Who are you? ... Who am I?
Stay away! You are dragging a behemoth of woeful bad luck in your wake! I want nothing of it!!
Did you smash every mirror in WorldName!? You hapless fool, you are cursed beyond help!!
I feel a terrible fate surrounding you! You should just stay in bed today!
What manner of salt did you spill to receive such misfortune!?
Negative energy is seeping from your pores. I wouldn't take any chances today.
Unfortunate omens hang over your head. You DID forward that letter, right?
The air feels dull and gloomy where you step. Be wary of ill feelings.
Is something bothering you? Something doesn't feel quite right about you.
I sense a speck of good karma about you, but I could be mistaken.
There's something unusually warm about you. I'm not sure how to place it, but keep walking in that direction.
You are giving off a positive energy, like something grand could occur at any moment.
There are vibes of good fortune emanating from you, as though your wishes could possibly come true.
Have you a garden of four-leaf clovers? You are bursting with essences of great fortune!
Serendipity smiles upon you! It is likely you shall find profit in all things!
You are overflowing with a blessing of stupendous prosperity!!
Excessive health and happiness gush from your very being! You are a Godsend!!
Do you think anyone would mind if I wired a cake with bulbs instead of candles?
I should light up this dark and scary place to keep the monsters away.
I'd run some wire here, but the spooky dead things are in the way!
Oh no! There are pockets of low pressure rolling in, I must secure the power grid.
My wires are getting tangled in this cyclone. Watch where you step!
Great! There goes another pump. When will the lightning stop frying my equipment?!
Don't go outside right now while holding any of my products, you'll attract an unwanted dose of electrical power!
If it doesn't stop raining, my wrench is going to get all rusty!
Oh Fudge! Shorted out another outlet! I hate this weather.
I would have invited everyone to party in my home, but there's not mushroom.
This is an excellent place to start a family. Most of my friends were born here!
This place makes me feel good. I'm not sure why...
Our kind is very brittle, I worry for my brothers on this breezy day.
Wind is not my friend, I like the dark, calm places.
The weather seems detrimental to your species, human.
That last roar of thunder startled the spores right out of me!
Ahh... nice and damp. I feel so good.
Rain is cause for celebration for my people.
Everyone said they like stacked cakes, so I installed smokestacks in mine
Golly! What uncultured swine decided to break ground here?
Neither blood nor steam pumps in this miserable locale.
Ahh... a sip of tea to enjoy the breeze.
Why, this windy phenomena has inspired me ideas for a new jetpack engine!
Electricity? Don't be ludicrous! Nothing beats the power of steam!
Everything I tinker up is made of metal. This current situation surely is a cause for rethinking that!
The rain is a double edged sword you see... It provides us water for steam, but it also rusts our equipment.
This bloody downpour! I can't get a lick of anything done when it's all wet!
Brilliant, my dear! You have brought me an exquisite sample of the world's beautiful colors and aroma. In exchange, you may take this special bottle of dye.
[[Japanese]]: 素晴らしいよ、君！実に見事なサンプルを持ってきてくれた。それも世界でも美しい色と香りのものだ。引き替えに、このスペシャルな染料をあげよう。

[[English]]: You bring me a beautiful, rare flower... yes, yes? Take this bottle of special dye for your troubles, friend!
[[Japanese]]: 君は美しく珍しい花を持ってきたな…うむ、わかるだろう？苦労に免じてこのスペシャルな染料をあげよう、友よ！

[[English]]: Fantabulous, wonderful friend! With this delicate specimen, I may mix the most amazing dyes {WorldName} has ever seen! You may take this one right away!
[[Japanese]]: 最高だ、素晴らしい友人よ！この優美な標本なら、これまで {WorldName} で見た中で最も素晴らしい染料に会えるかも知れない！君は今すぐこれを持っていっていいぞ！

[[English]]: Oh no no, this will not do.  For these money is no good, you must return to me with a rare specimen of a plant!
[[Japanese]]: ああ、ダメだダメだ。この染料はいくらお金を積まれても渡せないよ、私に希少な植物標本をくれたらプレゼントだ！

[[English]]: You think you can pull a fast one on {DyeTrader}, I don't think so! I only take the rarest of flowers for these special bottles!
[[Japanese]]: この{DyeTrader}を騙そうなんて考えないことだね！このスペシャルな染料はスペシャルな花としか交換できないんだ！

[[English]]: These dye bottles? Sorry dear friend, these don't take coin. I only take the most precious and rare of flora in exchange for one of this!
[[Japanese]]: これらの染料ボトルが欲しいのかい？残念だが親愛なる友人よ、これはコインじゃやれない。自生植物で最も貴重で希少なものを私がもらって、それでこの中の一つと引き替えだ！

[[English]]: I truly love parties, so many beautiful colors and happy people.
My, my... this is no good. The putrid surroundings are dulling my dye petals.
You think this a place worthy of my presence? So drab, so dull, these people are literally below me.
Marvelous! The wind brings me petals of all colors!
Give me a moment, my dear. I must secure my palette from the gusty gales!
Egads! I loathe these bothersome storms!
Please, do tell when the wrath of nature has ended out there!
Too much water dilutes my selection! This rain better pass, soon!
No, no, these robes cannot get wet! They will lose their vibrant color!
Have you seen an ogre yet? I want to ride on the back of one!
[[Japanese]]: 鬼って見た事ある？一回背中に乗ってみたいの！

[[English]]: Hmm? Nothing special today... just kidding! It's party time, and then it's after party time!
[[Japanese]]: うーん？今日は特別な日じゃないよね…なんてね！特別じゃないのはパーティー中と二次会中だけよ！

[[English]]: At last, my time has come!
Woo hoo! It's party time! ...Uh, why isn't anyone moving?
We should party so loud that we LITERALLY wake the dead! Hee hee!
Did somebody say hurricane party!? I'll bring the batteries!
This is like, an amazing time to fling confetti everywhere!
There was a sudden crash of thunder at the disco, and I panicked!
Let's dance! We can shake our hips to the beat of the sky!
It's raining outside! Come on in and party!
Oh, are you all wet? Well, shake it off!
Where ya been!? There's a total party going on! Here, take the cake!
Shhh! Don't tell ANYONE I gave you this! It's a party surprise!
Party up! You're like, in charge of the cake, {PlayerName}!
Are the tunes killing your party? I'll shuffle the playlist for you.
I think this party could use a switch-up! How about these jams?
We've been partying to this song for years! Let's change it up!
This party is going to be nuts, maybe even bolts!
[[Japanese]]: このパーティは多分ナット、ボルトになるだろう！

[[English]]: Fascinating. This appears to be a storage unit for broken and malfunctioning humans.
My sensors indicate an increased density of energy particles. My visual receptors are unable to identify any of them.
Sensors indicate strong shifts in barometric pressure. Caution is advised.
A strong contrast between high and low pressure detected.
BEEP! Severe weather warning. This is not a test. Take shelter, immediately. BEEP!
Abnormal levels of negative and positive charged particles detected.
Precipitation detected. Advising self to seek shelter. Rust imminent.
Flash flood warning. Error 404: Sandbags not found.
I tried having a paintball fight, but everyone wanted food and decorations instead.
I paint walls and furniture, not bones! It isn't Dia de Muertos!
What a dreary place... it sure could use a splash of color, huh?
Feel that draft coming through? It's wafting paint fumes all over the place.
This wind storm just blew all the fresh paint right off the wall!
When the thunder rolls, and the lightning strikes... it really brings out the colors on the furniture.
Blink and you'll miss it. The brightest colors stand out when the lightning flashes.
Rain is my worst nightmare. It literally rinses out all my hard work!
I painted a mural on this wall just a moment ago. Shoulda bought a weather radio!
I sense a kindred spirit in the Etherian Dark Mages. A pity they are our enemies, I would have liked to learn from them.
I wanted to see how your kind celebrate, I am not disappointed.
You may remove the reaper from the cemetery, but you may not remove the cemetery from the reaper...
The sound of rain is soothing to the soul.
Balance is key. We need sun, we need rain. Too much of either leads to ruin.
Keep your talismans close... if you wind some, you lose some.
The wind blows with the leaves, the leaves blow with the wind.
The spirits sound loudly this day, in blinding majesty.
Lightning casts powerful shadows, shadows cast powerful lightning.
After all that cake, you might have to call me White Beard for a while.
[[Japanese]]: ケーキを食べた後、オメェから白ひげって呼ばれるかもなぁ

[[English]]: Arr... hate to say it, but many me mateys put these holes in the ground... if ye catch me drift!
Hardee harr... the sea be a pirate's graveyard! Ye landlubbers waste ye time!
Hoist the sails, ye curs! We pirates startin' a leg of a race! Yarharharr!
All hands on deck! A storm of wind be brewin'!

Eek! This deathly atmosphere is ruining my perm!
I kinda want to go out there and collect heads of hair for wigs, but I kinda don't want to GO OUT THERE!

[[Japanese]]: もしかしてオレが子供だからパーティーが好きだと思ってるか？まぁ正しいよ、パーティーしようぜ！

[[English]]: I'm totally scared right now! It is all YOUR fault!
How can I fish out there?! Are you crazy, or just stupid!?
Wind is usually a great time to fish, but this is too much! I almost hooked my eye out!
Is this some kinda hurricane!? I almost got hit by a dolphin!
Thunderstorms are the best time to go fishing! Also the most dangerous! That's why I'll send you to do it for me!
This one time at fishing camp, lightning struck the lake! Suddenly, all the fish floated up to the surface for free!
Yes! It's raining! Now I can watch you get soaking wet while you fish for me!
I always go fishing in the rain! It's why I wear this hat!
You know, super scary things lurk in the water during a Blood Moon! You should totally go try it! I'll watch from here!
You should try fishing when the water is all bloody! It's to die for!
Death and taxes, nothing more sure in life than that!
The people here aren't paying up! They are better off dead! Oh, perhaps they already are.
Just because your house blows down, doesn't mean you stop paying taxes!
Bah! If this wind keeps up, people will lose their precious possessions and stop paying me!
A marvelous storm! A remarkable storm!
I am as giddy as a drunken man! I love this weather!
Humbug! Someone tried to tell me they saw a fish walking on land. Who do they take ME for?!
Why can't it be raining gold coins!? Water is everywhere! Bah, how useless!
For starters, take a few of these Defender Medals, on the house! I've got some special defenses you can purchase, but only with Defender Medals!
[[Japanese]]: まずは、ディフェンダーメダルを何枚か集めてきてくれ！ 特別な防具と交換してやるぜ！

[[English]]: Huh? How did I get here? The last thing I remember was a portal opening up in front of me...
[[Japanese]]: ハァッ？ 俺はどうやって、ここに来たんだ？ 目の前にポータルがあったのは覚えているんだが...

[[English]]: We should really do something about the Old One's Army. Ask me about the Eternia Crystal if you want to learn more.
Great job on fighting off the Old One's Army! But I'm sure we haven't seen the last of them, they didn't put up much of a fight this time.
The Army of the Old One's keeps getting stronger, yet you keep pushing them back! But something tells me they aren't quite finished with us yet.
You really kept the full force of the Old One's Army at bay? Maybe you should visit Etheria some time.
There's a party happening here! I had just wiped down the bar, too.
You should sit down and have a little fun. Don't worry, I don't think any kobolds will crash this party.
Etheria has some dark places, but this takes the cake!
The bar seems kinda dead tonight. Smells like it, too!

Hold onto your bonnet, there's a real breeze out today.
Take shelter from the storm! Sit down for a pint.

Wipe your feet before you step in here, the floor was just waxed!
Thank you for the rescue. If I were trapped out here any longer, I could have come down with a heat stroke!

Many say that parties give you the richest of memories. So buy something and make this memory rich!

Got a torch? If so, won't you guide my sleigh tonight?!
Many say that parties give you the richest of memories. So buy something and make this memory rich!

Your courses are well below par. That's a good thing!

Not quite champion level, but you'll do.
If you keep swinging like that, you'll end up hurting someone... or yourself!
